name: vite-template-monorepo
description: Monorepo with frontend, backend, and proxy

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../proxy && npm install && cd ../terminal/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:proxy" "npm run dev:terminal"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:proxy" "npm run start:terminal:backend" "npm run start:terminal:frontend"
